TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you get some even now (as you did before your wish) so congrats, you wasted your wish to accomplish nothing.

I wish a personal Imperial Star Destroyer.

Edited January 20, 2015 by cicatrix
typo

Granted, but Lone Star gives you the raspberry jam.

I wish I had brought my laptop with me today...

Granted. Instead of being safely at home, it is stolen.

I wish there was a mod that streamed texture tiles from Google Earth into RSS KSP.

Granted. Instead of being safely at home, it is stolen.

I wish there was a mod that streamed texture tiles from Google Earth into RSS KSP.

Granted, you get one but it requires huge bandwidth and just as huge amount of RAM which makes it unusable even on hi-end machines.

I wish to the Dark Side of the Force

Granted, but it crashes your game

I wish I had some cheese

Granted. You now have cheese. Tons of it. It is also molten and flows down the streets Boston-Molasses-DisasterÃ¢â‚¬â€œstyle and you are standing right in its path.

I wish I had a couple bitcoins.

Granted, but it smells kinda funky and has a suspicious fuzzy spot on it.

I wish for more internet!

Granted, it only has cats in it.

I wish the ONE RING

Granted. The One Ring exists and would give great power to any who hold it. It's on Sauron's finger.

I wish for a Covenant- and Flood-free Halo.

Granted. It's just a regular old farming game, since there's nothing left to fight.

I wish for molten ice.

Granted, but it was from the septic tank...

I wish for Lazarus 1 to arrive at Duna faster.

Granted. It arrives at the surface of Duna at a thousand m/s.

I wish for an intact fence in my garden, in the same place as the broken one.

Granted there is now only one section of the fence which is intact.

I wish I could have Kerbal ribbons

Granted, but the ribbons have to be cut off of spools of gift-wrapping ribbon.

I wish I could build a working SSTO soon.

Granted. The save corrupts after the first successful flight.

I wish KSP Win64 bit was more stable.

Granted, but now x64 windows is more unstable than the x64 winKSP ever was.

I wish I had a rubber ducky.

Granted, but Ernie steals it.

I wish I had more free time in school.

Granted, but you pay for this by having less free time for the rest of your life.

I wish I could land like a boss.

Granted. Have you ever seen your boss land?

I wish adequate computer security was distinguishable from paranoia.

granted it's called stupidity now every reader of this post know.

I wish truth to be a fake.

Granted. This causes a logical paradox that eats all of your electronics.

I wish to be less bored.

granted. excruciating pain isnt boring right?

I wish I could fly my tail takeoff/landing plane in KSP and not ode or corrupt the save

- - - Updated - - -

*die or corrupt

Granted. It corrupts your computer.

I wish for some Chex Mix.

Granted, but they changed the recipe now they are made out of onions and beetroots.

I wish it was summer

Granted. In Australia.

I wish I had a self-loading dishwasher.
